name: Z-termination demo
description:
You play as skull an elite soldier sent to investigate b-city and eliminate any threats

he finds there.

controls:

- arrow to move

- x to jump

-c attack

-v to roll

-b to shoot 

- up arrow to open door.

use controller for better experience.

Special thanks to BAZ and all the ones that created PGM MV tutorials , they made it very easy to use.(PGM MV is my favorite  engine now).

-created in 1 week with PGM MV demo version.
